item.title: 周五，数百名移民被送往圣地亚哥的一个公交车站，而不是作为中转站的接待中心，因为当地资金的耗尽比预期的要早。
item.description:
Hundreds of migrants were dropped off Friday at a San Diego bus stop instead of at a reception center that had been serving as a staging area because it ran out of local funding sooner than expected. https://t.co/emuFpMhqiE

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局宇航员维克多-格洛弗（Victor Glover）将驾驶这次四人飞行任务，这将是50多年来人类首次飞往月球。他希望 "阿耳特弥斯二号 "任务能够激励人们追寻自己的梦想，到达星空。
item.description:
NASA astronaut Victor Glover will be piloting the four-person mission that will be the first flight to the moon with humans on board in more than 50 years. He's hoping the Artemis II mission will inspire people to follow their dreams of reaching the stars.https://t.co/nOvTxcTpuo

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 2012 年，史蒂夫-格里格（Steve Greig）的爱犬被车撞死，当时他 "悲痛欲绝"，希望 "能有一些好的结果"。因此，他决定收养老年犬，在它们的晚年给予它们关爱。
item.description:
When his dog died after being hit by a car back in 2012, Steve Greig said he was "devastated" and wanted "something good to come out of it." So, he decided to adopt senior dogs and give them love during their twilight years. https://t.co/qQgIz497rQ pic.twitter.com/H8Re1bjWva

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 威斯康星州道德委员会建议对一个与前总统特朗普结盟的筹款委员会提出重罪指控，因为该委员会涉嫌密谋为一名特朗普支持的候选人提供不正当的资金来源，而该候选人挑战了特朗普的一位强大的批评者。
item.description:
The Wisconsin Ethics Commission recommends felony charges against a fundraising committee aligned with former Pres. Trump for allegedly conspiring to improperly line the pockets of a Trump-endorsed candidate who challenged a powerful Trump critic. https://t.co/VfPdQmeWHj

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: "今晚看到老朋友闪亮登场"凯蒂-佩里在斯威夫特的 Eras Tour 悉尼站为好友泰勒-斯威夫特助阵。
item.description:
"Got to see an old friend shine tonight." Katy Perry supported her friend Taylor Swift at Swift's Eras Tour stop in Sydney. https://t.co/IyGSovUzAs

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 调查人员称，一对美国夫妇在加勒比海失踪，据称三位越狱犯在被当局抓获前曾使用他们的游艇跳岛。
item.description:
An American couple has gone missing in the Caribbean after three escaped prisoners allegedly used their yacht to island hop before getting recaptured by authorities, investigators say. https://t.co/PnpiJEddIX

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 当全世界都在等待奥德修斯从月球表面发送第一批图像时，官方周五宣布，月球着陆器可能出现了失误。
item.description:
As the world waits for Odysseus to send its first images from the moon's surface, officials announced Friday that the moon lander may have had a misstep. https://t.co/QyuMqdasXl

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 官方消息：一架军用直升机在密西西比州东北部的一次例行训练飞行中坠毁，造成两名国民警卫队队员死亡。
item.description:
BREAKING: Two National Guardsmen are dead after a military helicopter crashed in northeast Mississippi during a routine training flight, officials say. https://t.co/Q5Zbm28y96

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：学校官员说，在佐治亚大学一名跑步的女生被发现死亡一天后，一名谋杀嫌疑人被拘留。这名 22 岁的护理专业学生在跑步后没有回家，被报告失踪。
item.description:
JUST IN: A murder suspect is in custody one day after a woman who went for a run at the University of Georgia was found dead due, school officials said.

The nursing student, 22, had been reported missing when she failed to return home from a run.https://t.co/cASR7zTXCw pic.twitter.com/GYcPLTT5vG

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）表示，乌克兰战争已经过去两年，拜登政府对俄罗斯实施的经济制裁正在发挥作用，但她承认还有更多工作要做。
item.description:
Two years into the war on Ukraine, the economic sanctions against Russia leveled by the Biden administration are working, according to Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo, but she concedes there is more to do. https://t.co/J9y11e0eLt

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据调查人员称，一对美国夫妇在加勒比海失踪，因为据称有三名越狱囚犯利用他们的游艇跳岛，然后被当局抓获。
item.description:
BREAKING: An American couple has gone missing in the Caribbean after three escaped prisoners allegedly used their yacht to island hop before getting recaptured by authorities, according to investigators.https://t.co/USeN6MNvXA pic.twitter.com/3fjaVaWnvQ

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：陪审团认定全国枪支协会（NRA）对财务管理不善负有责任，并认定该组织前首席执行官韦恩-拉皮埃尔（Wayne LaPierre）腐败地管理着这个美国最著名的枪支权益组织。
item.description:
BREAKING: A jury found the NRA liable for financial mismanagement and found that Wayne LaPierre, the group's former CEO, corruptly ran the nation’s most prominent gun rights group. https://t.co/6ecGNSp76c pic.twitter.com/kYVQ0IcxRk

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：陪审团认定全国枪支协会（NRA）对财务管理不善负有责任，并认定该组织前首席执行官韦恩-拉皮埃尔（Wayne LaPierre）腐败地管理着这个美国最著名的枪支权益组织。

item.title: 最新消息：在佐治亚大学雅典校区一名跑步的女子被发现死于 "谋杀 "后一天，学校官员称一名谋杀嫌疑人已被拘留。

item.title: 最新消息：据美国官员证实，北美防空司令部的一架战斗机在犹他州上空 4.3 万至 4.5 万英尺的高度拦截了一个小型气球。
item.description:
BREAKING: A small balloon, as it is being characterized, has been intercepted by a NORAD fighter aircraft over Utah at an altitude of 43,000 to 45,000 feet, a U.S. official confirmed. https://t.co/rwwURVcDuA pic.twitter.com/u9332fbAKv

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 官方消息：北美防空司令部的战斗机拦截了一个在美国西部高空飞行的小型气球，经评估不构成威胁。
item.description:
BREAKING: NORAD fighters have intercepted a small balloon, assessed to not be a threat, flying at a high altitude over the western U.S., officials say. https://t.co/rvlXwvRlay

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 新消息：在最新发布的照片中，国王查尔斯三世微笑着阅读祝福者在他被诊断出癌症后寄来的卡片和信息。
item.description:
NEW: In newly released photos, King Charles III is seen smiling, reading cards and messages sent by well-wishers following his cancer diagnosis.

Earlier this week, Charles said the messages have "reduced me to tears most of the time."https://t.co/4rCQqijF44

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 事态发展：据密西西比国民警卫队称，一架军用直升机在密西西比州东北部的一次例行训练飞行中坠毁。

item.title: 在俄克拉荷马州奥瓦索市的学校里，16 岁的非二元制学生奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在与其他几名学生发生肢体冲突一天后死亡。
item.description:
The death of Nex Benedict, a nonbinary 16-year-old who died one day after a physical altercation with several other students at their Owasso, Oklahoma, school, has sparked calls against LGBTQ bullying across the country. https://t.co/ktS3pADgQe

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：纽约州最高法院的书记员已对前总统特朗普的民事欺诈案下达了判决令，开始对其 4.54 亿美元的罚款进行计时。
item.description:
JUST IN: The clerk for New York County's Supreme Court has entered the judgment order in former President Trump's civil fraud case, starting the clock on his $454 million penalty. https://t.co/P2ONmP73hX

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 南卡罗来纳州共和党总统初选将于本周六拉开帷幕，目前只剩下两位主要候选人：前总统特朗普和前联合国大使妮基-黑莉。以下是初选的相关信息：
item.description:
South Carolina's Republican presidential primary kicks off on Saturday, and only two major candidates are left to duke it out: former Pres. Trump and former U.N. Ambassador Nikki Haley.

Here's what to know about the primary: https://t.co/9q11R7TYwM

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 据美国内部估计，到春天时，乌克兰将面临潜在的灾难性弹药和防空系统短缺，这可能有效扭转战局，并使俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）获得巨大优势。
item.description:
By spring, Ukraine faces a potentially catastrophic shortage of ammunition and air defenses that could effectively turn the tide of the war and lend Russian Pres. Vladimir Putin a significant advantage, according to an internal U.S. estimate. https://t.co/bnubNRpQGp

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院裁定冷冻胚胎是 "孩子 "后，试管婴儿治疗停止了，阿拉巴马州的妇女描述了她们的心碎。
item.description:
Women in Alabama are describing their heartbreak after IVF treatments stop following the state Supreme Court decision that frozen embryos are "children." https://t.co/VKmZonpHCH

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：阿拉巴马州最高法院做出胚胎应被视为儿童的裁决后，阿拉巴马州总检察长不打算起诉体外受精提供者或家庭--该裁决使整个过程陷入混乱。
item.description:
BREAKING: Alabama's AG does not intend to prosecute in vitro fertilization providers or families in the wake of a state Supreme Court ruling that embryos should be considered children — a decision that has thrown the whole process into chaos. https://t.co/DiCf06d673 pic.twitter.com/OGTtauV2H8

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：前总统特朗普打破了他对阿拉巴马州最高法院关于试管婴儿裁决的沉默，呼吁阿拉巴马州立法机构 "迅速采取行动"，保护获得治疗的机会。
item.description:
JUST IN: Former Pres. Trump breaks his silence on the Alabama Supreme Court ruling on IVF, calling on the Alabama legislature "to act quickly" to protect access to treatment.

Trump said he wants "to make it easier for mothers and fathers to have babies." https://t.co/L0hbhGzj2z

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：阿拉巴马州最高法院做出胚胎应被视为儿童的裁决后，阿拉巴马州总检察长不打算起诉体外受精提供者或家庭--该裁决使整个过程陷入混乱。
item.description:
BREAKING: Alabama's AG does not intend to prosecute in vitro fertilization providers or families in the wake of a state Supreme Court ruling that embryos should be considered children — a decision that has thrown the whole process into chaos. https://t.co/VBDy8luCxq

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 纳瓦尔尼的母亲要求警方对扣留其子遗体的调查人员提起刑事诉讼。周五，警方给了纳瓦尔尼的母亲 3 个小时的时间，让她同意举行私人葬礼，否则就告诉她纳瓦尔尼将被埋葬在他去世的监狱里。
item.description:
Navalny's mother asked police to open a criminal case against investigators who she says are withholding her son's body. On Friday, his mom was given 3 hours to agree to a private funeral or told that Navalny would be buried at the prison where he died. https://t.co/bPn8Mh9P0p

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 当局称，一名前殡仪馆老板被指控将一具女尸藏在灵车后面两年之久，并囤积了至少 30 人的火化遗骸，现已被捕。
item.description:
A former funeral home owner accused of hiding a woman's corpse in the back of a hearse for two years and hoarding the cremated remains of at least 30 people has been arrested, authorities said. https://t.co/RvMHSlvmq3

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 新消息：前总统特朗普根据富尔顿县检察官内森-韦德（Nathan Wade）的手机通话记录提交了一份申请，要求在他的佐治亚州选举干扰案中输入新证据。
item.description:
NEW: Former Pres. Trump has submitted a request to enter new evidence in his Georgia election interference case based off Fulton County prosecutor Nathan Wade's cellphone records.https://t.co/uGveB73eaM pic.twitter.com/HuVf7KQH0W

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 北卡罗来纳州的一位黑人棉农正在努力将棉花与美国黑人之间的痛苦故事转化为对其社区多年来所取得的经济进步的肯定。
item.description:
A Black cotton farmer in North Carolina is working to turn cotton’s painful story with Black Americans into an affirmation of the economic progress that his community has achieved over the years. https://t.co/eXHc6aOFmD

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024
